Articles.Content:
Hi,

I posted this question into the general section, but got some suggestions to post it here as well.

Science is fun but after collecting some random data, I'm already beginning to loose track of what I've actually collected and where I did that. How about a cumulative sheet of all the data that we previously collected? It would make things so much easier to keep track of.

Yes Please, I came on the forum looking to see if anyone had something like this, but I guess not.

It's really needed as you start to exhaust local science opportunities.

Ditto - after collecting about my 14th sample of moon rock I kinda forgot I've done this 8 times already.

(double meaning there ^)
